svg.script: var NS_SVG = 'http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'; function run_test() { var gNode = document.createElementNS(NS_SVG, "g"); gNode.setAttribute('filter', 'url(#filter)'); var rect = document.createElementNS(NS_SVG, 'rect'); rect.setAttribute('width', '100'); rect.setAttribute('height', '100'); rect.setAttribute('fill', 'white'); gNode.appendChild(rect); document.documentElement.appendChild(gNode); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); } document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", run_test); setTimeout(run_test, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest
